section.title: Getting the Client
section.para: The Apache Qpid JMS client for AMQP 0-9-1/0-10 is available as a bundle or from ${qpidMavenRepoDesc}.

The bundle (a .tar.gz) includes the Client itself (formed by two JAR: qpid-client and qpid-common) together with slf4j-api, and geronimo-jms_1.1_spec. There is also a qpid-all JAR artifact that, for convenience, includes a manifest classpath that references the other JARs. The bundle is available from ${qpidDownloadUrlDesc}.

section.title: Dependencies
section.para: The Client has minimal set of external dependencies.

It requires:
JDK 1.7 or higher.
The Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Unlimited Strength policy files are required for the Message Encryption feature.
JMS 1.1 specification (such as geronimo-jms_1.1_spec JAR)
Apache SLF4J (slf4j-api-x.y.z JAR)
The use of SLF4J means that application authors are free to plug in any logging framework for which an SLF4J binding exists.
